        java.io.File createExcel(Customer inputCustomer,
                       int logId,
                       java.util.ArrayList<Customer> inputList)
                         throws java.lang.InterruptedException,
                                java.lang.Exception
        Creates an excel file based on the master excel sheet and fills out the customers information
        Parameters:
        inputCustomer - The customer object to use when creating the excel-file
        logId - The id of the logentry the excel-file will be attached to
        inputList - A list of additional customer-objects to add to the excel-file
        Returns:
        File
        Throws:
        java.lang.InterruptedException
        java.lang.Exception
